You can toggle this on and off, filter the rate at which it happens, adjust the volume, and choose whether only you or others can hear them.

subItems.title: Sound Designer
subItems.desc:
You can now store your own sound effects within a mental playlist and play them at any time. This playlist can be visualized in your mind, projected outward as a screen, or something else entirely.
The scale, pitch, tone, frequency, and other aspects of these sounds are completely toggleable. You can also mix these sounds in a variety of ways to create unique results.

details.title: Hydro Ooze
details.desc:
You can selectively secrete a sticky, transparent substance that attracts and absorbs water to unnatural levels. When stuck to an object, it is very difficult to remove. Absorbing water increases its volume, and its ability to absorb water increases with volume. This can cause a chain reaction that rapidly 'sucks up' all the water in the area that it can which causes it to rapidly grow.
It cannot aborb water from the air, and it cannot aborb water from living organism. However, it can rapidly dry out the skin that it touches.
At very low temperatures (around -30°C), it temporarily shrinks into a powdery substance with less adhesion.

subItems.title: Ooze Manipulation
subItems.desc: You can now use your ooze as a blaster power, allowing you to eject it from your body at high speeds and move it telekinetically with your mind. While stuck objects will still weigh it down, any attracted water is not factored in, allowing you to attract large amounts of water with little force required.

subItems.title: Thermal Catalyst
subItems.desc: Your ability to heat up surfaces allows you to turn your ooze into a more permanent glue. This causes it to lose its attractive properties towards water but has the advantage of letting you perfectly fuse surfaces together.

details.title: Show Your Work
details.desc: By writing down each step as you solve a problem — whether it’s calculations, decisions, or reasoning — you will be able to solve that problem three times faster.

details.title: Radiation Eater
details.desc:
Your body has mutated to metabolize ionizing radiation as a source of energy. While not perfectly efficient, this ability allows you to survive and even thrive near hazardous radiation levels. Your cells are far more resistant than a normal human's, enabling you to stand near something like the Elephant's Foot for a few hours with only minor radiation sickness that your body can quickly purge.
However, extreme rapid exposure — like to the Demon Core — can still overload your system, temporarily shutting down your ability and causing acute radiation poisoning, though you'd still survive where others wouldn't.
A steady, high-radiation source puts your body into a temporary overdrive, pushing you to peak human physicality. But stay in that state too long, and you'll crash from the strain. Moderate levels, on the other hand, boost your stamina, reduce your need for food or sleep, and make you healthier overall.
This heightened metabolism will also make your body emit noticeable heat, enough that anyone touching you might be alarmed by how hot your skin feels.

details.title: Squeeze
details.desc:
You can spatially compress any object, but at a very slow and tiring rate. For every minute you squeeze an object between your hands, its volume permanently shrinks by 20%.
This cannot work on living beings and uses more and more stamina the longer you shrink something.

details.title: Game Dev
details.desc:
You are a Tinker 1 with a specialization in developing games of all kinds. Card games, video games, board games — you name it, you can probably make it. While your technology isn't useful in combat, you can create household masterpieces that can impact people indirectly. Furthermore, the speed at which you can develop these games is practically the only thing that could be considered 'parahuman,' able to make enough progress in a day that a full and experienced team of developers would take a month to match.
Finally, your products aren't tinkertech outright, more like technology that would be a decade or so ahead of its time.

subItems.title: More Fun for Less
subItems.desc: Your games are organized to pack as much as possible into small packages: playing cards perfectly scaled for beautiful artwork and clear writing; models and pieces neatly organized to minimize damage and loss while positioned to take as little space as possible; and fitting what seems to be double the limit of any game cartridge or disk, all while pushing their systems to work 50% better than their limit through clever coding tricks.

subItems.title: Better Games
subItems.desc: You don't merely make games; you elevate them. Those you create have such a level of detail and care that it would take years of dedicated effort to replicate. They are easy to play and understand but capable of possessing layers upon layers of mastery. Even at their worst, they never feel half-hearted or unfinished, as your games become the pinnacle others follow: a guiding star to light the way to a future.

subItems.title: The Quest Giver
subItems.desc:
The point of a game is, first and foremost, to do something. Sometimes it’s solving puzzles, sometimes it’s killing monsters, or maybe it’s fetching an item — regardless, these activities also need to be fun, something you have a real talent for.
You can easily make tasks in your games enjoyable to just about any player and can also easily come up with dozens of ideas to keep players occupied.
The stories you tell, the characters you design, and the worlds you create are all exquisitely detailed, and many would be hard-pressed to consider them incomplete. They have a depth that makes them almost lifelike in their design, as if the characters could actually exist or that the worlds themselves were once real.
Beyond making you one of the best storytellers, character designers, and world-builders to have ever been born on Earth, you will also have the ability to flesh out just about any idea. This means that anything you design, whether it be the ornate details of a sword or the winding paths of a maze, will be incredibly intricate and well-thought-out.

subItems.title: Designer
subItems.desc:
As a designer, you are one of the best of your craft. You know just how to design your games to be well-balanced, intuitive, and easily explained, with a depth to their mechanics.
You could easily design a game that suits many playstyles without favoring any specific one, intuitive enough for a baby to use, and could add aspects for the real hardcore players to search for and master.

subItems.title: Niche Product
subItems.desc: When developing your games, you can choose to gear them towards a certain clientele, whether they are enjoyers of specific genres or a broad demographic. You gain an up-to-date, instinctual ability to know what they want and why. This massively improves reception among these people without affecting the rest of the market too much. With this insight, you can increase the amount of work you can do in a day by roughly 50%, with a similar boost to quality.

subItems.title: Cultural Craze
subItems.desc: Your skills with games have expanded beyond creation into something more vile and cutthroat: marketing. As you make games, you'll know instantly how to make them noticeable and draw people in, capturing the imagination of the public while navigating public opinion and the media to easily make your games popular, regardless of the medium. All of this comes to you effortlessly, as even games that become failures earn you a nice profit and some fans. With a little luck and hard work, it's very possible for you to build an empire that rivals the Pokémon Media Franchise at its peak.

subItems.title: Educational
subItems.desc: Your games can be not only fun but also educational, with your players never realizing they're learning. Literacy, mathematics, critical thinking, short- and long-term planning, situational awareness, history, wilderness survival, occult defenses, economic theories, game theory, visualization, mind games, social skills, and learning something about themselves — all become part of your games. These games transform into more than treasured memories for many; they become the building blocks for brighter futures.

subItems.title: Play together
subItems.desc:
Games are meant to be played for fun, but that's not their limit. Due to your knowledge of helping others and your medical expertise, you can prove this.
Now, you can easily design your games to help people in various ways — whether it's helping them work through issues by venting in safe and constructive manners, processing their emotions and traumas, or even reaching out to others. While these elements can be the centerpiece of a game, they can also be easily added to other projects.
It's not just mental or emotional, either. You intuitively know how to make your games more accessible to others, such as by including Braille on your cards or designing controllers for a wide range of abilities. It may not seem like much at first, but it will make a world of difference for some people. Sadly, there is only so much you can do for game journalists.

subItems.title: Trust me with IP
subItems.desc:
You are something nearly unheard of — an anomaly in an industry where image is worth more than gold. You are someone others can trust their intellectual properties (IPs) with. Because of this, you have a much easier time using IP, from something as minor as using it for a theme for a game to much grander things, such as an expansive game that uses the characters and lore of the IP in new ways, or even creating crossovers of multiple IPs.
With every successful product, you find it easier to acquire the rights to use new IPs, with restrictions being loosened with every success. And if you have the Reputation perk, it wouldn't be long before people are just handing their IP to you — or even begging you to use them.

subItems.title: Pipelines & Middlemen
subItems.desc:
You know how to make games, but even if it's the greatest ever conceived, production and distribution can bring it all to a halt — until now. You intuitively grasp what will be needed to mass-produce and distribute your games on every level of the supply chain, along with knowing who would be worth partnering with and who can be trusted to act as middlemen. Should no infrastructure exist for your needed supply lines, you know where and how they can be built, along with having fallbacks to minimize risk.
You can effectively weigh the cost and resources of each step of the supply chain and consider factors that may go over the heads of others, such as seeing the value in a local partner you can hold great soft power over when compared to an overseas mass producer. You use all you have to get the best results, leveraging everything you can to turn setbacks around.
When all is said and done, you know how to make games and how to get them to people, making a profit where others would have lost money.

details.title: Harmonization
details.desc:
Your body is your sanctuary, and with this subtle but life-changing power, it finally feels like it.
Every morning, you wake up feeling truly rested — no grogginess or lingering fatigue. Your skin is always clear and comfortable, free from breakouts or irritation.
Your body’s internal cycles and hormonal rhythms are perfectly balanced. You experience no mood swings, cramps, or other unpleasant side effects.
If you have a menstrual cycle, it is silent and painless; your body quietly recycles what it needs, leaving you unbothered. If you don’t, you still benefit from stable hormones and smooth regulation.
Reproductive health is optimized for comfort, with your reproductive system remaining healthy and trouble-free. For those who can become pregnant, the process is gentle and manageable, with minimal discomfort and a swift recovery.
The symptoms of aging — aches, stiffness, and forgetfulness — are softened. You still age, but the transition into old age is easier and more comfortable.
You’re not immune to disease or injury, nor are you superhuman. Your body simply works with you, not against you, making daily life that much more pleasant.
You don’t glow or sparkle, but every day you wake up with a body that feels like it’s on your side. The little annoyances of life fade into the background, letting you focus on living, not just enduring.

subItems.title: Symphonic Flesh
subItems.desc:
Your body is not merely healed — it is whole. With this power, your form exists in perfect internal harmony, not just as you are now, but as you always should have been. Every strand of muscle, every fiber of tissue, and every cell in your body sings in accord with your core self. This is no mutation or enhancement; it is simply you, aligned completely with your ideal genetic expression.
From the moment you choose, your body reshapes itself according to the best it could have become, guided by ideal growth conditions and perfect health from the start of life. It does not grant power, height, or features you never had in your blood, but it does ensure every feature you could have had is brought to full bloom. Your body becomes the ideal execution of your natural template.
Every inch of your skin, the structure of your bones, the slope of your shoulders, the sharpness of your jawline, and the tone of your muscles — all of it becomes a living symphony. You are not superhuman, but you are the absolute best version of a human you were ever meant to be.
This harmony is not static. Each morning, your body re-aligns itself to maintain its internal rhythm.
You are not flashy. You do not glow. But you are always right: the way you move, the way you sit, the way you breathe. You are not what others dreamed you could be. You are what you were always meant to become.

details.title: Calisthenics
details.desc:
You need no equipment beyond your own body weight to train yourself. No matter how strong you become, you can get a good workout with nothing but a calisthenics routine suitable for a normal human.
A routine that is moderate for a normal person will keep you in shape if you have no other powers to do so; a routine that would be intense for the average athlete will see you making impressive gains, even when you can normally bench-press mountains.
When this power is active, the actions you take for the purpose of exercise will both strain and tire you as they would a baseline human, even if your other powers would normally prevent this.
This effect will cease the moment you stop exercising.

details.title: Tai Chi
details.desc:
You can redirect and reflect kinetic energy, but only by moving with the force rather than resisting it. By shifting the energy's path away from you — much like the principles of Tai Chi — you can deflect attacks and momentum-based impacts. This ability applies to both your body and weapons, allowing for fluid parries.
However, its effectiveness depends on the force's power and mass — a punch or thrown object is easy to redirect, but something as heavy as a speeding car would simply overwhelm you. Your reaction speed is another crucial limitation; if an attack is too fast or catches you off guard, you won't be able to respond, making this ability ineffective against bullets or similar high-speed projectiles.

details.title: Arms
details.desc: You are capable of growing and retracting two extra arms from your lower back. This pair of arms possesses every characteristic of your regular arms, with a few key differences. For one, they are a third longer to account for reach and possess an extra elbow each for greater flexibility. Additionally, certain muscles along your back also grow when these arms are manifested to allow for the same stability and strength as if they were on your shoulders. Any clothes or armor you are wearing will adapt to the new arms, with sleeves or greaves being created ad-nihilo as they grow. When you retract your arms, these are similarly retracted.

subItems.title: Grasping Pinions
subItems.desc:
Your wings have been genetically spliced with your extra arms. Your ‘arms’ are now grotesque wing-limbs, twisted by biological necessity. These wings’ muscles are corded and strengthened to the point of being veiny, blurring the line between the two body parts.
The hands at the end of these limbs are replaced by talon-like formations consisting of a fan of hyperflexible digits. The excess flaps of skin on these wings, ending in what look like keratin scales, are in fact fingers complete with fingernails, originating from thinned hands that flare out from the base of the wings.
While these are more fragile, they are nonetheless numerous and possess the same dexterity and tactile sensitivity as your dominant hand, allowing you to pick a hundred locks at once or play on a dozen phones at the same time, given the ability to multitask. The support musculature on your back has been significantly enhanced as well, now acting as ‘wrists’ to support the hundred-handed appendages. Additionally, these wings can still retract, and your clothing and armor still adapt to them.

details.title: Tea lady
details.desc:
Whenever you drink tea that you made yourself, your body and mind are nudged back to a normalized version of yourself.
If you are too hot, you are cooled down; if you are overexcited, you will be calmed; but if you are tired, you will regain energy.
The more your current condition differs from your 'normal,' the more tea you need to fully normalize yourself.
This ability also works on both malignant and beneficial power effects of many kinds, so long as they directly affect your body or mind.
Drinking tea diminishes powers granted by others, many kinds of Master effects, and Striker effects such as teleportation marks or granted invulnerability.
Drinking tea does nothing against environmental effects and does not heal you or revert your form in any way.

details.title: Rent Free
details.desc:
One or more things about you are guaranteed to leave a lasting impression on the people you meet. From your accent and mannerisms to your opinions and voice, one person might remember your quirks as an amusing hiccup, while another might find them stuck in their head like a new song, unconsciously adopting your habits.
You can't control the specifics of what people will remember you for and won't be aware of them unless you can read minds, but each impression you make is guaranteed to paint you in a neutral light at worst or a positive one at best.
You can control the intensity of your impressions based on intent and skew them towards a specific perception.

details.title: It's Magic!
details.desc: You are a Tinker 1 specializing in magic tricks of all kinds, such as vanishing cards, swallowable swords, and rabbit-producing hats. This does not grant you more skill when performing these tricks.

details.title: God’s Tongue
details.desc: You gain an ultra-acute sense of taste, capable of detecting the tiniest imperfections in any dish with a single taste. For example, you'd be capable of recognizing and differentiating different types of salt by country and knowing exactly how long a specific ingredient was overcooked. If you tried, you could also learn to gain information from tasting inedible things.

details.title: Intimidating Crepitation
details.desc: By cracking your knuckles, neck, or any other part of your body, you can intimidate those that hear the crack. This can range from earning you some respect to inducing intense fear, depending on the situation. You can intensify the effect through slow repetition, pointed threats, or typical intimidation tactics. You can limit who is affected, though the effect becomes diluted the more targets it affects.

details.title: Heartless
details.desc:
Your circulatory system has changed to function without the need for a heart. Specialized muscular contractions along your veins and arteries keep your blood in constant motion, effectively replacing the heart’s pumping action. Cuts seal themselves almost instantly, and blood vessels clamp shut to prevent bleeding, drastically increasing your survivability against punctures or ruptures.
While you can still suffer from severe trauma or blood loss if enough tissue is destroyed at once, ordinary injuries that would normally cause fatal bleeding are now mere inconveniences. Your body naturally maintains stable blood pressure and flow, even under extreme exertion.
You are immune to up to 20gs of force and any heart-related powers, whether benign or not, such as being killed by a heart attack from the Death Note, as you lack the organ.

details.title: Wireless Charger
details.desc:
You possess the ability to generate weak, variable electromagnetic fields to wirelessly charge or power electronic devices. This process draws directly from your own biological energy — primarily in the form of calories but potentially from other sources like magical energy, if you possess them.
Distance to the object may drastically decrease charging efficiency; similarly, direct physical contact increases it. Additionally, you are limited in the number of devices you can charge at the same time without a multi-tasking power because each device will need its own field due to different requirements.

subItems.title: Tingles and Tricks
subItems.synergy: Surge; Muscular Growth; Skin; Radiation Eater or Solar
subItems.desc:
Your electromagnetic power has evolved due to other powers in play. First, you can now generate additional electrical energy through your muscles and skin. This allows you to shock people with a maximum power that depends on the surface area; your open palms are akin to a defibrillator, whereas your fingertips would be like a stun gun. This can, in turn, be used on yourself to stimulate your muscles for extra power or restart your heart should the need arise.
You can produce a magnetic field from your skin, which will also drain your energy. Holding a bunch of spoons to your face won't use too much, but creating a field strong enough to damage vulnerable hardware would require more energy. You cannot use this to hold your own weight for long without additional energy reserves.
The boosts from Surge can be increased further by drawing upon your biological energy, raising it to 60 as the hard limit. This could leave you bedridden at best or dead at worst, with the lower levels having less severe but still present backlash.

details.title: Eye Protection
details.desc:
A thin, near-invisible film covers your eye sockets from the inside. It stops foreign substances from touching your eyes and slowly eradicates them. You can allow things to pass through it.
The film absorbs any tears that touch it to lubricate your eyes and absorbs excessive light — from all parts of the light spectrum — to fuel the eradication of substances. As a side effect, your eyes are protected from light, and you will be unable to cry unless you allow your tears to go through the film.

details.title: Bioluminescent Stripes
details.desc:
Luminous bands bloom beneath your skin along the natural lines of muscle and bone. You can turn them on or off at will, choose any color, and modulate their brightness from a faint glow to a retina — searing glare, though extreme output rapidly burns calories. The light is cool, non-laser, and carries no concussive force.
You can hold a steady glow, pulse, or strobe in any pattern and can sync it to your heartbeat or steps. This works perfectly underwater: brightness isn’t dampened by immersion, strobes can cut through murk for signaling, and you can tighten the glow to your skin to reduce backscatter.

details.title: Forecast
details.desc: You have a sixth sense that informs you of the upcoming weather for your general location for the next few days.

details.title: Invisible Air
details.desc:
Any weapon or object you hold can become invisible as the air around it conceals it. This does not apply to organic beings. You cannot see the object yourself.
When you make the object visible again, the concealed wind surges violently in all directions.

details.title: Smart Organs
details.desc:
Each of your organs now possesses neuron-like networks that continuously monitor vital data such as blood pressure, sugar balance, oxygen saturation, and toxin levels. These pre-programmed neural circuits expand each organ’s natural capacity by integrating new 'senses,' allowing them to detect subtle imbalances or threats before they become serious.
The organs do not make you stronger or faster, but they vastly improve your body’s internal awareness and regulation. With practice, you can consciously access this data as though receiving silent status updates from within.

details.title: Bat Ears
details.desc:
Your auditory system has been drastically enhanced. While the average human perceives sounds in the 20 Hz to 20 kHz range, your hearing now spans from 10 Hz to 200 kHz — putting you on a similar level to bats.
In addition, loud or high-frequency sounds no longer cause pain or disorientation. Your eardrums are highly resistant to damage and recover far more rapidly than normal if injured.
Your brain is fully equipped to process the increased sensory input without strain. Unwanted sounds can be effortlessly filtered out, allowing you to focus only on what matters.

details.title: Infectious Yawns
details.desc: Whenever you yawn, you can choose to selectively make everyone else around you feel somewhat tired. You can also now yawn on command.

details.title: Dimensional Awareness
details.desc:
You now possess the ability to attune yourself to the dimensional fabric of reality, granting you a form of Dimensional Awareness.
With this heightened perception, you can detect dimensional irregularities in your immediate vicinity. This includes things like time bubbles, spatial distortions, portals, unstable space-time, and even warped or altered reality.
Note that this awareness does not provide protection against these phenomena, nor does it offer a means to manipulate them. It simply allows you to sense their presence and understand their nature.
Additionally, while you can technically detect the micro-portals within the corona pollentia of Parahumans, these are so minuscule that you would need to be within 5 meters of a Parahuman to perceive them — unless they are actively using their powers, in which case you can detect them from 20 meters away.

details.title: Pacinian Corpuscles
details.desc:
Your feet have developed sensory structures that grant them the tactile abilities of an elephant's foot. With them, you can detect minute, low-frequency seismic vibrations through the ground with your bare feet, effectively allowing you to 'hear' distant movements across a wide area.
Yours, however, are far more sensitive by area to compensate for the smaller surface of a human foot, but this also means injuries to your feet will feel significantly more painful. Your brain has been tweaked to interpret this new sensory input without confusion.
